title: Backflow preventer inspection certificates
dataVerified: Property address, backflow device ID, inspector/company, test results, compliance
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Test status (passed/failed). Link to certified tester system (water utilities and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake backflow certificates. Domain binding verifies certified tester. Drinking water contamination prevention. EPA Safe Drinking Water Act compliance. Water utility requirement.
